title: Realspace® Magellan 59"W Manager's Computer Desk, Blonde Ash
descriptions:
Upgrade your workspace with the Realspace® Magellan 59"W Manager's Computer Desk in Blonde Ash. This sleek and stylish desk is perfect for both home and professional use. Constructed with durable medium-density fiberboard and a scratch-resistant paper laminate finish, this desk is built to last. 

With a slide-out keyboard tray and four spacious drawers (including a file drawer), you'll have plenty of storage space to keep your workspace organized. The Blonde Ash color adds a touch of elegance to any room. 

This desk is ANSI/BIFMA tested for performance standards and is water spill-resistant, making it a practical and reliable choice for your office. While assembly is required, in-home assembly service is available for your convenience. Don't settle for a mediocre desk - invest in the Realspace® Magellan 59"W Manager's Computer Desk for a workspace that's both functional and stylish.

The slide-out keyboard tray provides added convenience while the medium-density fiberboard construction ensures durability. Plus, with scratch and water spill resistance, this desk is built to last. Easily assembled and ANSI/BIFMA tested, this desk is designed for comfort and functionality. Don't struggle with heavy or oversized furniture, call our in-home assembly service at 866-388-4350 for a stress-free setup experience. Elevate your workspace with the Realspace® Magellan desk today!
